title: vandAi vandE aruL
sahitya:
vandAi vandE aruL tandAi nI vandAi  chidambaranE 


anupallavi

  shentAmaraip-padam paNindE magizhndEn sindaiyelAm niraindAi shivanE nI 


caraNam    teriyAdavaraiyum terindE kAttiDum puram eritta aranE annai magizh IshanE
ariya vaittE manam teLiya vaittE eLiyavarkkum aruLum varanE nI
